mapper.select: SELECT BO.BOARD_SEQ , BO.BOARD_TYPE , BO.BOARD_TITLE , BO.BOARD_CONTENT , BO.BOARD_SECRET_YN , BO.BOARD_DEL_YN , BO.REPLY_YN , BO.REPLY_CONTENT , BO.REPLY_MEMBER_ID , BO.REPLY_DT , BO.ATTCH_FILE_CNT , COALESCE(BO.INQ_CNT, 0) AS INQ_CNT , BO.REG_ID , BO.REG_NM , BO.REG_DT , BO.UPD_ID , BO.UPD_NM , BO.UPD_DT , M.MENU_SEQ , M.MENU_NAME FROM BOARD BO INNER JOIN MENU M on M.MENU_SEQ = BO.BOARD_TYPE WHERE BO.BOARD_DEL_YN = 'N' AND BO.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} ORDER BY BO.BOARD_SEQ DESC LIMIT 5
